name: markviewer
description: Web-based markdown viewer with PlantUML, Mermaid, and search capabilities

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev-concurrent: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run serve"
scripts.setup: npm run download-plantuml && npm run download-frontend-libs && npm run install-all
scripts.download-all: npm run download-plantuml && npm run download-frontend-libs
scripts.package-all: npm run package && npm run package-executables
scripts.clean: rm -rf release node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules dist
